mapper.select: select no, imagepath, name, price from product order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into product(no, imagepath, name, explanation, price, context, image1, image2, image3) values (seq_product.nextval, #{imagepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name}, #{explanation}, #{price}, #{context}, #{image1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
